text: Just a Gigolo is a 1931 American romantic comedy movie directed by Jack Conway and was based on the 1930 play Dancing Partner by Alexander Engel. It stars William Haines, Irene Purcell, C. Aubrey Smith, Charlotte Granville, Lilian Bond, Ray Millard and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1931 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Conway
title: Just a Gigolo (1931 movie)
